title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: I don't understand the issue described in Bug 8142. Please provide more details.
OB: When I try to view the scoped type hierarchy in binary projects (e.g. org.apache.ant), I receive the following message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.'
EB: When I try to view the scoped type hierarchy in binary projects (e.g. org.apache.ant), I expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. However, I receive the message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.'
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant).
2. Try to view the scoped type hierarchy of the project.
3. Observe the message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.'
